verses.verse: A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> Bow <S%H5186>down<s%> thine <S%H241>ear,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%>

Preserve <S%H8104><s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H2623>holy:<s%> O <S%H859>thou<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> that <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in <S%H413>thee.<s%>
Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me, O <S%H136>Lord:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee <S%H3605>daily.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> art <S%H2896>good,<s%> and ready to <S%H5546>forgive;<s%> and <S%H7227>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> them that call <S%H7121>upon<s%> thee.
Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> unto my <S%H8605>prayer;<s%> and <S%H7181>attend<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications.<s%>
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I will call <S%H7121>upon<s%> thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> thou wilt <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.
Among the <S%H430>gods<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> like unto <S%H3644>thee,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord;<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> are there any works like unto thy <S%H4639>works.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, O <S%H136>Lord;<s%> and shall <S%H3513>glorify<s%> thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Teach <S%H3384><s%> me thy <S%H1870>way,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in thy <S%H571>truth:<s%> <S%H3161>unite<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3824>heart:<s%> and I will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> is thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> me: and thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H4480>hell.<s%> <S%H7585><s%>

O <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> are <S%H6965>risen<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and the <S%H5712>assemblies<s%> of <S%H6184>violent<s%> men have sought <S%H1245>after<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> thee <S%H5048>before<s%> them.

But <S%H859>thou,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> art a <S%H410>God<s%> full of <S%H7349>compassion,<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> <S%H750>longsuffering,<s%> <S%H639><s%> and <S%H7227>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth.<s%>

O <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me; <S%H5414>give<s%> thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of thine <S%H519>handmaid.<s%>

Show <S%H6213><s%> <S%H5973><s%> me a <S%H226>token<s%> for <S%H2896>good;<s%> that they which <S%H8130>hate<s%> me may <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> hast <S%H5826>helped<s%> me, and <S%H5162>comforted<s%> me.
